homepage.benefitDesc3: All contracts are encrypted prior to storage. Commitment to content integrity when signing by OTP or pen, meeting the requirements of the Law.

homepage.featureDesc1: The solution shapes objects in 3 dimensions, allowing to reproduce the landscape clearly and realistically up to 90% of reality. This technology supports the accurate reproduction of the current state of the objects. objects, vegetation, structures, with the ability to calculate and measure dimensions.
homepage.featureDesc2: The 3D/360 image reproduces the true space and becomes increasingly valuable over time, serving the restoration and restoration of heritage sites.
homepage.featureDesc3: Provide information and services to meet customer needs with each specific language in the software.
homepage.featureDesc4: Really interact with the 3D/360 world, measure actual dimensions with +-mm error.
homepage.featureDesc5: Virtual reality, augmented reality applications that bring virtual objects into real surroundings, can interact more directly and realistically.
homepage.featureDesc6: Some interactions with 3D models such as: rotate, move, zoom in, zoom out, ... with 3D models, serving user needs.

homepage.commentPrepend2: Many of them are asked about their satisfaction with our service And here are their answers.
homepage.commentDesc1: In the context of the epidemic, factories and production cannot organize tours for customers, students... When digitizing factories in virtual reality space, users from all over the world can You can visit the factory with just a computer or phone. The AI system can digitize data, create a virtual director or guide, lead people on a tour of the system, answer all questions directly.
homepage.commentDesc2: Visitors can feel the scratches of time, the wear of the knife, the torn pieces on the lapel - eloquent proofs of historical vestiges. In addition, visitors to the galleries can select languages. Even direct visitors who want to see the images in digital form can scan the QR code to see the details of the artifacts in the form of 3D images.
homepage.commentDesc3: Currently operating VTS products/services can be listed as: Products: 3D virtual reality, 3D digitized maps, 3D processing software, scanners...
homepage.commentDesc4: With efforts and a great technology solution, VTS 3D is receiving very good reviews and feedback from customers and ..
